Collection Name: University of Colorado Boulder History Collection
Title#1: General information relating to the the semi-centennial celebration of the University of Colorado, 1927
Abstract#1: A document containing general information relating to the semi-centennial celebration of the University of Colorado Boulder in 1927. The document mentions that CU Boulder intended to publish a series of five volumes regarding subjects of high interest to citizens of the state of Colorado. The volumes include geology and natural resources, Colorado plant life, zoology of Colorado, past and present studies of Colorado, and creative intelligence and modern life. The document continues to provide information about various campus buildings, points of interest around campus, and housing and transportation for guests.
Subject Name#6: Cockerell, Theodore D. A. (Theodore Dru Alison), 1866-1948

Collection Name: University of Colorado Boulder History Collection
Title#1: University of Colorado Boulder campus parking map, 1957
Extent#1: 1 map : printed in blue, red, and black ink
Abstract#1: A map depicting all the locations where parking is available at the University of Colorado Boulder campus. The map specifies parking lots for faculty and staff in blue ink, and parking for students with permits in red ink. The map also notes that, "Only permit holders are allowed to park their motor vehicles on the campus during the hours from 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m."
